resources.strings: The Best-Selling Planner Proven To Help With Organization and Productivity

LifePlanner™ aims to increase your productivity by organizing your life to focus on your goals.
Plan for tomorrow and celebrate today with this award-winning app that's proven to increase productivity and time management. 94% of customers agree that LifePlanner™ helped them better organize their life. Try it for yourself today!
WHY LIFE PLANNER™ ? – The Ultimate daily/Weekly/monthly and even yearly Planning System – Perfect for Planning Aficionados and Newbies Alike! – Completely Customizable and Personalizable – Filled With Designer Details, Inspiration and Extras!
Special thanks to: eucalyp [https://www.flaticon.com/authors/eucalyp] from www.flaticon.com for design icons and the whole flaticon.com team.
